rvest
part of the tidyverse 0.3.2.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles

Generate a minimal html5 page.

Source: R/minimal-html.R
minimal_html.Rd

See http://www.brucelawson.co.uk/2010/a-minimal-html5-document/ for details.

minimal_html(title, html = "")

Arguments

title

Page title
html

Other html to insert into page.

Examples

minimal_html("test")
#> {xml_document}
#> <html>
#> [1] <head>\n<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8 ...

  • Examples
